title: Atombot robot
description: A quadpedal wheeled robot that is being developed at the University of Michigan. The dog features multiple sensors on the chasis, three motors on each leg to drive kinematics and a motor to drive the wheel, powered currently by two rasberry pi 5. The goal of the robot is to be able to walk up stairs, run, jump, and navigate through a more complex surrounding, with the final goal of being able to behave in swarms.
